messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Posting etiquette
messages.messageBody:
From: "Paula Sjogerman" <sjogy@...>

<<Well, this is a repeat, but it's worth it. PLEASE only cut and paste the
lines you are responding to and then your answer. >>


I reply but delete unwanted parts. Does is still all come through??? If so
please let me know and I apologize in advance.

Mary B

messages.subject: Posting etiquette
messages.msgSnippet: on 6/17/03 10:46 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Well, this is a repeat, but it s worth it. PLEASE only cut and paste the lines you are
messages.messageBody:
on 6/17/03 10:46 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Does anyone have any other ideas?

Well, this is a repeat, but it's worth it. PLEASE only cut and paste the
lines you are responding to and then your answer. Try reading in digest mode
for a few days and you'll see what I mean. I often just cannot weed through
all the massive quotes and yahoo footers to get to what counts. I know I'm
missing lots of good stuff.

If you just hit reply without cutting and pasting, the post contains
EVERYTHING that was in the post you're replying to - sometimes it's four or
five previous messages. I'm finding myself getting mad at those who pay no
attention to this.

So, again, please......

Paula, the sore-armed
